channel.title: Megaupload founder Kim Dotcom released on bail
channel.description:
http://www.google.com/hostednews/ap/article/ALeqM5g8mwHpMaJNv-b96Vvd7zisuk_dFA?docId=f503e9b981534ddbbb1711392cc8f91a
WELLINGTON, New Zealand (AP) — Kim Dotcom, the founder of the file-sharing website Megaupload, was released on bail Wednesday after a New Zealand judge determined that authorities have seized any funds he could have used to flee the country.
I'm curious what direction the files are going in now?

item.title: Megaupload founder Kim Dotcom released on bail
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:2, topic:433825”][quote]
Asked how he had been treated by the police after his high-profile arrest, Dotcom said, “Well, it felt a little bit like an audition to ‘American Idol.’”
[/quote]
lol[/quote]Haha, I read that. This guy was like your ideal example of a rich /b/tard…

Read full topic
item.source: Megaupload founder Kim Dotcom released on bail
